name: Galaxy Brawls
description:
Galaxy Brawls is a two players local arcade style shooter. You play against a friend, whoever kills the other one more scores.

AWD control the Player1 ship, press S to fire

JIL control the Player2 ship, press K to fire

Soundtrack available on Soundcloud:

https://soundcloud.com/user-737325487/galaxy-brawls-noloop

Thanks:

This game uses free assets by Permadi Mobile
